alert.note: Alert for Carter; Johnston; Murray (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 13 at 6:54AM CST until December 13 at 7:30AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Tornado Warning for... West central Johnston County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Carter County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Murray County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 730 AM CST. * At 654 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Ardmore, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Lone Grove, Dickson, Springer, Dougherty, Gene Autry, Lake Of The Arbuckles and northwestern Lake Murray. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 26 and 46. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter, safe room or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
